eqTemp.name: eqTemp
eqTemp.notes: An arbritray scale widely used in western music

hSeries.name: hSeries
hSeries.notes: A set of whole number ratios representing how sound works in nature

truePythag.name: truePythag
truePythag.longName: Pythagorean just intaonation including the syntonic comma
truePythag.notes: A set of whole number ratios using only fifths e.g. 3/2

pythagorean.name: pythagorean
pythagorean.longName: Pythagorean just intonation excluding the syntonic comma
pythagorean.notes: A set of whole number ratios using only fifths (3/2) except for the octave (2/1)

fiveLimit.name: fiveLimit
fiveLimit.notes: A set of whole number ratios using only powers of 2, 3, or 5

diatonic.name: diatonic
diatonic.longName: Five limit diatonic / Ptolemy's intense diatonic
diatonic.notes: A justly-tuned major diatonic scale that uses the 5-limit system devised by Ptolemy

diatonicIndian.name: diatonicIndian
diatonicIndian.notes: A justly-tuned diatonic scale that uses 27/16 for Dha

twentyTwoShrutis.name: twentyTwoShrutis
twentyTwoShrutis.notes: A justly-tuned Indian scale described by the Bharata and Dattilam

bluesMajorRitsusenYo.name: bluesMajorRitsusenYo
bluesMajorRitsusenYo.shortName: Blues major, Ritsusen (律旋), yo scale
bluesMajorRitsusenYo.longName: Blues major, Ritsusen (律旋), yo scale
